name: Energy Import Overload
title: Highest Energy Import Dependency
description: In 2022, Malta had the highest energy import dependency in the world, with net energy imports accounting for 389.55% of its energy use.

name: Minimal Methane Emissions
title: Lowest Methane Emissions from Energy
description: Malta recorded the lowest methane emissions from fugitive energy sources globally in 2015, with emissions at just 0.0001 Mt CO2e.

name: Struggling Crop Production
title: Low Crop Production Index
description: In 2022, Malta's crop production index was significantly low at 53.79, indicating challenges in agricultural productivity.
